page.title: 17HOBBIES IN CIMLA
page.content: Children in class 4H,Crynallt Junior school, carried out a survey into the leisure activities of the members of their families.They found that most people had at least one hobby or interest.The list of hobbies included reading,needlework,fishing,playing rugby and soccer football,playing chess,cricket,cooking,art and craft, computing,jogging,model-making,stamp- collecting,shell-collecting and fossil collecting.Wine-making and keeping-fit was popular with adults and children enjoyed "collecting".Two boys had rather unusual hobbies,one enjoyed motor-bike scrambling,the other was a keen "annual"collector.The annuals he collects are comic annuals like Beano, Sparky,Dandy,Topper and Beezer.He has a lot of the early annuals and he has almost every Beano annual since it was launched in 1938.
